[[File:SwordsFlag.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
[[Swordsmanship]] is a skill that allows the wielder to use Sword or Axe style weapons. High [[dexterity]] and [[strength]] is recommended for Swordsmen to swing faster and harder. It is coupled well with [[Anatomy]] and [[Tactics]] for damage increases as well as [[Lumberjacking]].

===Special Move===
Axes have a passive chance to strike a ''Concussion Blow'' on a target, significantly reducing the victim's [[intelligence]] for a period of time. [[Anatomy]] is factored into your chance to hit a Concussion Blow: (Anatomy / 100) * (Concussion Blow Base Chance). The maintainers of this archive are unable to provide an accurate value for the base chance. If you are determined enough, you may discover the details of the original base chance but know that the Game Masters have the ability to adjust this value as they see fit.

==Recommended Leveling==
:0-25.0: Buy from an NPC
:25-100: Attacking Targets

==Notes==
:Attacking targets in a dungeon will take advantage of the Dungeon skill boost.
:You can use a skinning knife on a friend or alternate character in heavy armor to level quickly.
